epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.store

Class KeyValueStoreWithKeyLocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.store.KeyValueStore
      • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.store.KeyValueStoreWithKeyLocks

  • public final class KeyValueStoreWithKeyLocks
extends KeyValueStore
    Implementation of a KV-store that should be used with a multi-threaded architecture. This uses a lock for each key as synchronization mechanism
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade
